definition: category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: Your reality is only spirit. Therefore you are in a state of grace forever.
sentences.chinese: 你的实相是纯粹属灵的，因此你永存于恩典之境。

sentences.english: Paul exposed a kind of service that appears to be spiritual but is really just a put-on, a show, an act to get attention.
sentences.chinese: 保罗揭露了一种看似属灵，但实质是伪装的事奉。

sentences.english: Superficial happiness without spiritual holiness in one of hell's major exports.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏属灵圣洁的肤浅快乐是地狱最大宗的输出品。

sentences.english: The mark of spiritual maturity is growing awareness of the sinfulness of sin.
sentences.chinese: 属灵的成熟，就是渐渐知道罪恶的本质。

sentences.english: But he that is spiritual judgeth all things, yet he himself is judged of no man.
sentences.chinese: 属灵的人能看透万事，却没有一人能看透了他。

sentences.english: The ultimate goal of spiritual giftedness and fruitfulness is to point men and women to God.
sentences.chinese: 属灵恩赐和果子的终极目标是使人归向上帝。

sentences.english: With the apostles, the spiritual geneology of Jesus Christ began to unfold.
sentences.chinese: 自使徒开绐，一个属灵的耶稣基督的家谱在延续。

sentences.english: Do you recognize the folly of a servant of God attempting to minister without eating of the heavenly manna?
sentences.chinese: 你想一个神的工人能不吃属灵的吗哪，而专一事奉么？

sentences.english: For in our union with Christ he has blessed us by giving us every spiritual blessing in the heavenly world" (Ephesians 1:3 TEV).
sentences.chinese: 他在基督里曾赐给我们天上各样属灵的福气。

sentences.english: He also blesses us with spiritual gifts and empowers us to yield the fruit of the Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 他施予我们属灵的恩赐，并帮助我们结出圣灵的果子。

sentences.english: In what ways does the food Jesus spoke of provide us with spiritual refreshment?
sentences.chinese: 耶稣讲论的事物在哪些方面提供我们属灵的更新？

sentences.english: This leads right into the second biblical factor for good health.
sentences.chinese: 我们顺此进入第二个属灵的健康因素。

sentences.english: With the apostles, the spiritual geneology of Jesus Christ began to unfold. It had its ups and downs.
sentences.chinese: 自使徒开绐，一个属灵的耶稣基督的家谱在延续。

sentences.english: Dry seasons are inevitable if we neglect the spiritual exercises.
sentences.chinese: 若我们轻忽属灵的操练，就免不了属灵的干旱。

sentences.english: Dry seasons are inevitable if we neglect the spiritual exercises.
sentences.chinese: 若我们轻忽属灵的操练，就免不了属灵的干旱。

sentences.english: It smacks of spiritual pride and elitism.
sentences.chinese: 它有点属灵骄傲与菁英的味道。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
the will of Heaven/the will of God
